lead_paragraph: Forget celebrity roasts. Inspired by rap throwdowns, standup comics are going head to head, and no subject is off limits.

headline.print_headline: Comics Now Sear Peers in Roasts on TV
headline.main: Insult Comedy as Blood Sport: The Rise of the Roast Battle

snippet: Forget celebrity roasts. Inspired by rap throwdowns, standup comics are going head to head, and no subject is off limits....
abstract: Jason Zinoman On Comedy column considers increasing popularity of roast battles, which feature comics trading barbs with one another and is inspiration for television show Jeff Ross Presents Roast Battle; suggests format, which has elements of traditional Friars Club roasts, American Idol and rap battles, reflects current political discourse.

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Jeff Ross Presents Roast Battle (TV Program)
